LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC0: The creator has waived all copyright and related rights. You can copy, modify, distribute and use the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY: You are free to share and adapt the material for any purpose, even commercially. You must give appropriate credit to the creator, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY-SA: You are free to share and adapt the material for any purpose, even commercially. You must give appropriate credit, and if you remix or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY-ND: You are free to share the material for any purpose, even commercially. You must give appropriate credit, and if you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you may not distribute the modified material.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY-NC: You are free to share and adapt the material for non-commercial purposes only. You must give appropriate credit to the creator, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY-NC-SA: You are free to share and adapt the material for non-commercial purposes only. You must give appropriate credit, and if you remix or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license.
LICENSES_DESCRIPTIONS.CC-BY-NC-ND: You are free to share the material for non-commercial purposes only. You must give appropriate credit, and if you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you may not distribute the modified material.

ABOUT.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Itqan is a modern content management system designed to provide an exceptional experience in managing digital assets and educational resources.
ABOUT.VISION_DESCRIPTION: To be the leading platform for digital content management and educational resources in the region.
ABOUT.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: Empowering educational institutions to manage their digital content efficiently and effectively.

CONTENT_STANDARDS.TITLE: Documents: Data Access Standards
CONTENT_STANDARDS.DESCRIPTION: This document outlines the standards for accessing data in files. Please follow the guidelines below for each category.

VERSE_USAGE.TITLE: Verse Usage Standards
VERSE_USAGE.DESCRIPTION: To access verses, follow these standards:
VERSE_USAGE.POINT_1: Use the correct verse ID format
VERSE_USAGE.POINT_3: Check for the latest updates in the verse database

WORD_USAGE.TITLE: Word Usage Standards
WORD_USAGE.DESCRIPTION: To access words, adhere to the following:
WORD_USAGE.POINT_2: Ensure the word list is up to date

TAFSIR_USAGE.TITLE: Tafsir Usage Standards
TAFSIR_USAGE.DESCRIPTION: To access tafsir, adhere to the following:
TAFSIR_USAGE.POINT_2: Ensure the tafsir list is up to date
TAFSIR_USAGE.EXAMPLE_TEXT: To retrieve tafsir for verse 2:255, use

ADDITIONAL_GUIDELINES.TITLE: Additional Guidelines
ADDITIONAL_GUIDELINES.POINT_1: Follow UTF-8 encoding standards to ensure proper display of Arabic text
ADDITIONAL_GUIDELINES.POINT_2: Validate data before use in production applications
ADDITIONAL_GUIDELINES.POINT_3: In case of issues or errors, report them to the responsible publisher
